txt.en: Bring the Orc-arrows to Foreman Mögr
You have stowed away many Orc-arrows to show to Mögr in the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nYou should return to Mögr with the arrows you collected.

Many Orc-arrows litter the floor of the Twenty-first Hall near the arch leading eastwards.\n\nYou should collect the Orc-arrows and show them to Mögr in the Twenty-first Hall as evidence that foes passed this way not long ago.
'Harrumph! These arrows could be from any time, really... one year or a hundred! I do not see what your discovery signifies, but I thank you for your efforts, just the same.'
Orc-arrows litter the floor of the Twenty-first Hall near the east arch.
Orc-arrows can be found near the East Arch of the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nYou should collect Orc-arrows to show to the dwarves of the Twenty-first Hall.
Orc-arrows can be found near the East Arch of the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nYou should collect Orc-arrows to show to the dwarves of the Twenty-first Hall.
